quote: Being a good example is the best form of service. – Sathya Sai Baba
fact: The Pentagon, in Arlington, Virginia, has twice as many bathrooms as is necessary, because when it was built in the 1940s, the state of Virginia still had segregation laws requiring separate toilet facilities for blacks and whites.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I was at the library and asked if they have any books on "paranoia", the librarian replied, "yes, they are right behind you"
